title: Seedlyfe Powdered Superfood and Vitamin Supplements
description: Seedlyfe superfood smoothie blends and powdered vitamins offer highly absorbable and digestible nutrition for each stage of the reproductive journey—from trying to conceive, pregnancy, postpartum, into motherhood, and beyond. Free US Shipping on all orders!
cleaned_text: Celebrity doula Lori Bregman brings her unique blend of healing, spirituality, nutrition and wellness to Seedlyfe where she empowers women to find their voice in pregnancy and create a solid, healthy foundation Throughout her career, Lori has studied with and learned from some of the most renowned doctors, healers and spiritual teachers across the world. She brings this knowledge to Seedlyfe in order to bring the top products and formulas to the table. All Seedlyfe products have been trialed, tested and perfected by Lori on her clients over the last 20 years. Lori is the author of [The Mindful Mom to Be](https://www.amazon.com/Mindful-Mom-Be-Foundation-Pregnancy/dp/1623363012), [The Doula Deck](https://a.co/d/3SbhLUk) and [Mamaste](https://a.co/d/f2floZM), Lori works with women throughout all stages of their personal transformation from fertility through pregnancy, into motherhood and beyond.
